history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. hauto lq: on drew: off use: Rmult_min_distr_l, Rmult_comm, Rnot_le_lt, Rmin_right unfold: Rmin, Rle. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rinv_r.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rinv_r (_ * / _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros n. induction n. - unfold C. simpl. rewrite Rinv_r. + field. + apply INR_fact_neq_0. - rewrite pascal_step1. + rewrite IHn. rewrite C_n_n. unfold C. simpl. field. apply INR_fact_neq_0. + apply le_n.
